# Resource: samsungcloudplatform_transit_gateway_peering_approve

Approve TGW Peering Request.


## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "samsungcloudplatform_transit_gateway_peering_approve" "approve" {
  transit_gateway_peering_id   = var.transit_gateway_peering_id
}
```
